result.reason: Gateway auth dialog hidden behind windows because UIParentWindowHandle was not set; fix already applied in RdpProtocol.cs line 466 setting UIParentWindowHandle to main form handle — verify it works for re-auth after hibernation/disconnect scenarios
result.approach: Fix already in place (UIParentWindowHandle set via dynamic cast to IMsRdpClientNonScriptable3). Mark as released if confirmed working in v1.81.0-beta.2, or investigate if re-auth after disconnect still hides the dialog (may need OnDisconnected handler to re-set the property).
